Title(s): ‘Speculum Gy de Warewyke’; ‘Speculum Mundi’; ‘Speculum vtile istius mundi’
_description: ‘Speculum Gy de Warewyke’ (also entitled ‘Speculum Mundi’ and ‘Speculum vtile istius mundi’) — in couplets

BodAddC220.First Lines:
HErkeneþ alle to my speche& helpe of soule y wol ȝow
                    techeþat y wole speke it is no fableAc it is swyþe
                    profytable…
BodAddC220.Last Lines:
…for ȝif he dede he wot welhe scholde lese of his
                    catel…

CULDd1189.First Lines:
Herkeneþ all vnto my specheHele of saule I wyll þu
                    teche…
CULDd1189.Last Lines:
…In trowþe loue & in chariteAmen Amen so mot it
                    be

CamStJohn256.First Lines:
lestnet alle to my spelleHelþe of soule i wil ȝou
                    telleþat i wil saie nis no fablebote it is swiþe
                    profitable…
CamStJohn256.Last Lines:
…& god leue so mote weSey alle amen par
                    charite

BLAdd36983.First Lines:
Herkeneþ alle to my spelleAnd hele of soule I wolle
                    telle…
BLAdd36983.Last Lines:
…In trewe loue & chariteAmen amen so mow hit
                    be

BLAru140.First Lines:
HErkenyþe all to my specheAnd heel of soul I wyll ȝow
                    tech…
BLAru140.Last Lines:
…Þe bonde nyl neuer lond ne styllDo nouȝt a
                    ȝeyne his lordes wyll

BLHar525.First Lines: Herkenithe all vn to my speche& hele of sowle I wylle you teche…
BLHar525.Last Lines: …And that hit soo mote beeAmen Amen for seynte charyte

BLHar1731.First Lines: HArkeneþ al to my specheAnd heel of soul I wil ȝow teche…
BLHar1731.Last Lines: …And leue & flye synful dedeBoþ for luffe & for drede…
BLHar1731.Note: Lines 1-910 only, ending imperfectly at bottom of folio, end of volume.

RylandsEng50.First Lines:
Herkenes alle to my specheAnd hele of soule I may ȝow
                    teche…

                    show
